main event: A round object was observed near Montrilie, Ohio, that changed color from red to white and was seen for about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on November 6, 1957, at 11:02 PM,The object was reported to be the size of a basketball,The altitude of the object was estimated to be 1,000 feet or less,The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes and was observed going west at an estimated speed of 400 knots,The conclusion of the sighting suggests it was likely an aircraft.
sighted object: a round object changing color from red to white
witness description: S/SGT Hansford F. Ayes, Det-G, 4671 GCS Squadron
